name: Hazari Trading
overview:
Hazari Trading is one of the most experienced companies involved in supplying, exporting and trading a comprehensive range of Cushion Covers, Ladies Stoles, Handmade Paper Items, Handbags and many more. Incorporated in the year 2012,

Vision: Under mentioned is the list of our Vision:

To offer excellent quality products Execution of every product order within the scheduled time frames Offering nothing less than the most cost effective products

Vendor Base; We are able to address the demands and needs of our clients, due to the long term relation that we hold with our vendor base. All our vendors have proved themselves in the relevant market domain and are known for being trustworthy.

Our Quality: We have been catering to the various industrial platforms which have been made possible with the help of our qualified team of professionals and skilled labor working in our manufacturing units and elsewhere. We have made our policies keeping in mind the systematic operations of our company.

Why Us? We are sincere towards our work and the first and foremost objective of our company is to serve our clients and fulfill all the requirements as expected by them. Our team maintains close coordination with the clients and ensures that their needs and demands are carefully understood and accordingly fulfilled.
